settings.content: Thank you for choosing our brand. If you need a return or exchange, please fill out the following form and we will reply to you within 1-3 working days.

settings.title: 1.Can our order be shipped to all countries?
settings.content: We currently support delivery to the following countries and regions:

settings.title: Regions that do not support delivery:
settings.content: Puerto Rico (PR), US Virgin Islands (VI), Guam (GU), Northern Mariana Islands (MP), American Samoa (AS), Alaska (AK), Hawaii (HI).

settings.title: 3.What is the delivery time for different regions?
settings.content:
We cooperate with different transportation companies to ensure fast delivery services for you. Here are the estimated delivery times for orders from different regions:

Within the United States:Orders within the United States will be shipped from warehouses located in the western United States. Estimated delivery time to various states/cities within the United States: 3-8 working days (may be delayed during holidays and weekends)

International Logistics:The delivery time for countries other than the United States is 7-10 working days (there may be delays during holidays and weekends). We will ship from the warehouse closest to you, automatically selecting the nearest warehouse and the fastest standard/ground service. International orders are sent through various carriers, and we cannot guarantee which shipping service or warehouse will be used before shipment.

settings.title: 4.Which courier carrier do you use?
settings.content:
We collaborate with multiple international courier companies to ensure fast and reliable delivery of your goods. Our main express carriers include:

  • DHL
  • UPS
  • USP MI

settings.title: 5.Does delivery require payment of shipping fees?
settings.content: All orders are eligible for free express delivery service. If you need special logistics services (such as expedited transportation), please contact us hello@aeststudio.com

settings.title: 6.Delivery address and delivery receipt
settings.content:
Shipping addressï¼šThe address you provided at checkout must be a valid address. We are unable to send orders to post office boxes, shipping addresses, or postal collection addresses in specific countries.

Sign in requirements:To ensure the smooth delivery of your order, the courier company will require the recipient to sign for it. If you are unable to personally sign for the package, you can choose to send it to a trusted address or contact the courier company to arrange for redelivery.

settings.title: 7.Delivery failed
settings.content: If the package cannot be delivered due to reasons beyond our control after two attempts, it will be automatically returned and we will contact you for a refund or redelivery.

settings.title: 8.Do I need to pay customs duties?
settings.content:
Some international transportation may require payment of tariffs, taxes, and customs fees. Please note that the shipping fees on our website do not include these costs, which we cannot control. We suggest that you contact your local customs office before international shipping to obtain more information about any additional fees that may be levied in your country/region.

If the customer refuses to accept the package due to import tariffs or taxes, the customer may bear full responsibility for all postage, return shipping, customs fees, and handling fees.

settings.title: 9.I haven't received my order yet or my package is damaged. What should I do?
settings.content:
If any items are lost or damaged in the received package, we sincerely invite you to file a claim with the carrier and submit it through hello@aeststudios.com Contact our customer service department. Please note that any claims related to delivery must be submitted within 15 working days after the package is delivered.

*After this deadline, we will not be able to claim any lost orders.
